column5: Our group is heading up to LacSeul for the first time 3rd week of sept.Looking for helpful hints for catching walleye and pike (techniques or baits),or any good stories during this week.
Evergreen Lodge has a fishing report on http://www.justfishontario.com/reports.htmIt looks like Gary should be able to help you out with where and how to catch walleye on that part of Lac Suel.

tom, just returned from that area about a month ago. try lindy rigging or bottom bouncing the flats in about 20' off the windward side of goose island. caught a bunch there. not far from your camp. gary know his stuff and will put you on them. the guy at the bait shop in town is very helpful also. good luck. patterns may have changed since then, so ask the locals. p.s. my son and i caught so many walleye that we literally got tired of it. hope you have the same luck. whit
